name: imagebox
description: ImageBox - AI image generation & prompt workflow (Next.js + Electron)
author: wangyixiao <wangyixiao@users.noreply.github.com>

scripts.electron:dev: npm run electron:compile && concurrently -k "npm run dev" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 -t 60000 && electron ."
scripts.electron:build: npm run electron:compile && npm run build && npm run electron:prepare && electron-builder --publish never
scripts.electron:build:mac: npm run electron:compile && npm run build && npm run electron:prepare && electron-builder --mac --publish never
scripts.electron:build:win: npm run electron:compile && npm run build && npm run electron:prepare && electron-builder --win --publish never
scripts.electron:build:win:diag: node -e "const {spawnSync}=require('child_process'); const env={...process.env, IMAGEBOX_DIAG:'1'}; const npmCmd=process.platform==='win32'?'npm.cmd':'npm'; const r=spawnSync(npmCmd,['run','electron:build:win'],{stdio:'inherit',env}); process.exit(typeof r.status==='number'?r.status:1);"
scripts.electron:build:linux: npm run electron:compile && npm run build && npm run electron:prepare && electron-builder --linux --publish never
scripts.electron:build:all: npm run electron:compile && npm run build && npm run electron:prepare && electron-builder --mac --win --linux --publish never
scripts.electron:publish: npm run electron:compile && npm run build && npm run electron:prepare && electron-builder --publish always
